dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1979
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reminisces about Peter Maurin and summarizes his program and repeats his favorite slogans. Snippets about books she's reading, comings and goings, protests, and mail. Notes the Watergate scandal.
